tp:error.name: General
tp:error.tp:docstring: A generic error. An example of a generic error is ModemManager not being able to parse the response from modem.

tp:error.name: Connected
tp:error.tp:docstring: Operation could not be performed while the modem is connected.

tp:error.name: Disconnected
tp:error.tp:docstring: Operation could not be performed while the modem is disconnected.

tp:error.name: OperationInProgress
tp:error.tp:docstring: Operation could not be performed because it is already in progress.
